partizipativeLeadership.title: Participatory Leadership
partizipativeLeadership.description: Develop leadership structures based on participation, collaboration and shared responsibility. Our consulting helps you create a leadership culture that includes all voices and promotes collaborative decision-making.

whatIs.title: What is Participatory Leadership?
whatIs.description1: Participatory leadership is a leadership approach based on shared power, collaborative decision-making and active participation of all stakeholders. In the school context, this means that teachers, students, parents and the community are involved in important decisions.
whatIs.description2: This approach not only promotes democracy in education, but also improves the quality of decisions through diverse perspectives and increases the engagement of all participants.

betterDecisions.title: Better Decisions
betterDecisions.description: By including different perspectives, more thoughtful and practical solutions emerge.

higherEngagement.title: Higher Engagement
higherEngagement.description: Employees and stakeholders feel heard and take more responsibility for common goals.

sustainableChange.title: Sustainable Change
sustainableChange.description: Participatory developed solutions are more likely to be accepted and implemented long-term.

overview.description2: Our expertise helps you integrate digital tools meaningfully while always keeping pedagogical goals in focus.

whatIs.title: What is Organizational Development?
whatIs.description1: Organizational development is a planned, systematic and long-term process to improve the performance and adaptability of an organization. In the school context, this means the continuous development of all aspects of school life.
whatIs.description2: People are at the center: teachers, students, parents and all other stakeholders are actively involved in the development process.
